name: NeoLink
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; script-src 'self' http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' data:;
